item.title: Register
item.para: If enabled, you can create your own account for use on this Gallery installation. Admins may set Gallery up so that logged in users have more permissions than a non-logged in user, so you might want to register.

To register, specify your desired username, full name, email address, and preferred language. Your password will be sent to you via email. After this, you can login to Gallery using your username and password.
